titles.title: Commending the Louisiana State University Tigers football team for winning the 2003 Bowl Championship Series national championship game, and commending the Southern University Jaguars football team for winning the 2003 SBN Black College National Football Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Committee on Education and the Workforce discharged.
Consideration initiated by previous order of the House.
Considered by previous order of the House.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 496.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous order of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/11/2004--Passed House without amendment. Commends: (1) the Louisiana State University Tigers football team for winning the 2003 Bowl Championship Series national championship game; and (2) the Southern University Jaguars football team for winning the 2003 SBN Black College National Championship.
